Developer Terms of Use
des:
You don’t need to use your home switches anymore to control your connected devices. Just ask Alexa.
Talk to your Alexa and ask them, in example, to switch on the lights of your living room, or switch off the plug besides the night desk or to change the light colour of the corridor. You can do all this with muvit iO Home skill for Alexa in a few easy steps:
1. Download app “muvit iO Home” on Google Play or App Store.
2. Register in our app “muvit iO Home”.
3. You will need at least one of our muvit iO Home smart devices.
4. Set up the smart devices in the “muvit iO Home” app and customize the name of the different rooms as well as the name of the devices to identify them for the use with the skills. 
5. Download “Alexa” app on Google Play or App Store.
6. Set up your Echo device with the “Alexa” app.
7. Search for skill “muvit iO Home” in the app's skill category list of Alexa.
8. Enable “muvit iO Home” skill and you will access to the register page of our app “muvit iO Home”.
9. Enter your user name and password for “muvit iO Home” and that’s all!

Enjoy the ease of use which allows the voice control to manage the smart devices of your home. 
You can check the following examples:
“Alexa, turn on the light of the corridor”
“Alexa, turn off the living room light”
“Alexa, turn on the power strip of the office”
“Alexa, turn off the plug of the night table”
“Alexa, turn on the LED strip of the living room”

Our skill “muvit iO Home” allows to control lighting devices such as bulbs, LED strips, lamps, as well as other products like smart plugs and power strips, indoor and outdoor cameras and a wide list of new products that will be soon available in the market.
